summary: George Kuffs, 21, leaves a pregnant girlfriend. He visits his brother Brad to bum money off him. Brad's shot and George IDs the killer at SFPD but to no avail. He inherits Brad's patrol district. He keeps it to get the killer.

keywords: breaking the fourth wall|talking to the camera|time bomb|man tied up|bound and gagged
title: Kuffs, poli 'por casualidad'
